charges.charge_description: 21:841A=ND.F NARCOTICS-SELL, DISTRIBUTE, OR DISPENSE 21 USC 841(a)(1)-Possession w/intent to Distribute Crack Cocaine (1)

charges.charge_disposition: Incarceration for total of 152 months-92 mos. as to Ct. 1 and 60 mos. as to Ct 2, to be served consecutively w/Ct. 1; 5 years S/R as to Ct. 1; 3 years S/R as to Ct 2, to be served concurrently w/Ct. 1; Total S/A $100.00; no fine (1)
